subject: Football
lead_paragraph: San Francisco 49ers security will ask tailgaters to leave the parking lot at Candlestick Park after kickoff under new security measures introduced by the team after fan violence marred a preseason game with the Oakland Raiders.
snippet: San Francisco 49ers security will ask tailgaters to leave the parking lot at Candlestick Park after kickoff under new security measures introduced by the team after fan violence marred a preseason game with the Oakland Raiders.
